name: Backspace Bouken Demo
description:
Explore and survive as the young typist Kana in an old-school dungeon full of absurd encounters, mysterious puzzles, surprising secrets, and more.

Wishlist the game on Steam today!

Follow us @BackspaceBouken or sign up for our mailing list at https://backspacebouken.com/.

The demo is out now! It features the first hour or so of the full game, and is still in active development (meaning the final game will have some major differences and a lot more content).

After you've played the demo, we'd appreciate it if you could fill out a form to help us in the future! https://forms.gle/EGBrxmmS45rDPkHm9
